contentList.content: The molten rage of the dwarven race beats within a fiery heart. The Dark Iron clan is a veil of comradery hiding a poisonous visage. These spitfires know distrust as commonplace, for the venom of their kin's intentions are only comparable to the heat of their fury. They unite under common purpose: serving the dreaded Ragnaros in an eternal hunt to join their flesh to sacred fire. For what better to temper the Dark Iron than a raging, living flame?
